column4: mu anamɔntutu dua yɛ fɛw a! W'aserɛ no ntoado tse dɛ edwindzi a Odwimfo pa ne nsa ayɛ."

column2: "Wo funuma tse dɛ kɔɔpow korkorba a Nsa mforaforae mmpa mu: Wo yafun tse dɛ ewifua kuw a Wɔdze nsukookoo abɔ ho aprɔw."
"W'enumfo ebien tsetse dɛ wansanmba beenu a Wɔyɛ ntafo."
"Wo kɔndua tse dɛ asombɛn abantsentsen; W'enyiwamba tse dɛ Hesbon nsutaae a ɔwɔ Bath-rabbim ɔponkɛse ho; Wo hwen tse dɛ Lebanon abantsentsen a Odzi kɔ Damaskɔs afamu no."
"Wo tsir a ɔso wo tse dɛ Karmel
column3: Na wo tsir do nhwi tse dɛ adaaben; No do ataku akyer ɔhen no ndɔmmum."

column2: "Mbrɛ wo ho dua yɛ fɛw na mbrɛ eyɛ enyisɔ

column3: Na w'enumfo tse dɛ esikyireamba siawsiaw."

column4: Mebɛtam esuo n'abaw no mu: Ma w'enumfo nyɛ dɛ wenyinamba siawsiaw
column5: Na wo hwen mu hua nyɛ dɛ aper;"

column2: "Na w'anomu tse dɛ nsa pa a Osian kɔ mo dɔfo yie
column3: Ɔma hɔn a wɔatotɔ nkom buebue hɔn ano."
bra ma yemfir edzi nkɔ haban mu; Ma yɛnkɛtsena nkurobaadze."

column2: "Ma yɛnsoɛr ahanamakye nkɔ we nyin nture mu; Ma yɛnkɔhwɛ dɛ wenyindua no abɔ nkukuduuduw
column4: Na pɔmegranate ekutu no abɔ nhyiren a: Hɔ na mibeyi mo dɔ ama wo."

column3: Na hɛn mbobowano ahyɛ nduaba horow nyinara a wɔsom bo ma
column4: afofor na adadaw a Medze esie ama wo
